message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000.  I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $13,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try $13,200 as my counteroffer. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually agreeable solution.
